## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style (ruff)
- [ ] I have run `ruff check` and `ruff format`
- [ ] I have run `mypy` for type checking
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] My code includes appropriate docstrings

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] I have run `pytest tests/` successfully

### Architecture

- [ ] My changes follow the 3-layer architecture (Core → Services → Capabilities)
- [ ] I have not introduced circular dependencies
- [ ] I have used appropriate timeout levels (T1-T5) where needed
